exchange.title: Which market this record is for. Can be NYSE, NASDAQ or OTC

name.title: Human readable description of the holiday

status.title: Status of the market on this holiday. Can be closed, early-close, late-close, early-open or late-open

open.title: Market open time on this holiday ( if it's not closed )

close.title: Market close time on this holiday ( if it's not closed )
